tool_description: Validates whether diagnostic trouble codes can be safely cleared and provides guidance on clearing procedures and potential consequences.

dtc_codes.description: Diagnostic codes to evaluate for clearing

repair_completed.description: Whether repair has been completed for each code

emission_test_pending.description: Whether vehicle needs emissions testing soon

error_messages: Array length mismatch: DTC codes and repair status arrays must have same length.
Safety critical codes: Some codes should not be cleared without proper repairs completed.
Emissions impact: Clearing codes may reset emission monitors and cause test failure.
Permanent codes present: Some codes cannot be cleared until underlying issue is resolved.
usage: Provide DTC codes and repair completion status for each. Specify if emissions testing is upcoming. Tool advises on safe clearing procedures.

clearable_status.description: Whether each code can be safely cleared

clear_warnings.description: Warnings or precautions for clearing each code

readiness_impact.description: How clearing affects emission monitor readiness
